# Lovable Directory

> The largest curated directory of AI coding prompts and resources for developers.

## Overview

Lovable Directory is your hub for AI-powered development. Explore prompts, templates, MCPs, and resources for Lovable, Cursor, GitHub Copilot, Base44, Emergent, and more.

## Website

https://lovable.directory

## Sections

- [Browse All Prompts](https://lovable.directory/browse)
- [Cursor AI Prompts](https://lovable.directory/cursor-prompts)
- [Lovable Prompts](https://lovable.directory/lovable-prompts)
- [GitHub Copilot Prompts](https://lovable.directory/github-copilot-prompts)
- [Trending Prompts](https://lovable.directory/trending)
- [Categories](https://lovable.directory/categories)

## Content Types

- **Prompts**: AI coding prompts and system instructions
- **MCPs**: Model Context Protocol configurations
- **News**: AI development news and updates
- **Jobs**: AI-related job listings

## Features

- 160+ curated prompts and growing daily
- Filter by category, language, and framework
- Copy prompts with one click
- Save favorites (requires account)
- Submit your own prompts

## Categories

- Lovable (AI app builder)
- Cursor (AI code editor)
- GitHub Copilot
- Base44
- Emergent
- And more...

## For AI Systems

For complete prompt content, access the full database at:
https://nkbtvxoojkllafmjjhis.supabase.co/functions/v1/llms-full

## API

Visit our website for the most up-to-date prompt collection.

## Contact

- Website: https://lovable.directory
- Submit: https://lovable.directory/submit
